para: QCTimeStepper objects describe ways of taking a single Quality ControlledThe expression quality controlled in this context is stolen from an old copy of Numerical Recipes. time step when solving a time dependent problem. Given a set of &field; values at time \(t\), they compute a set of new values at time \(t+\delta t\). The difference between QCTimeStepper and is that QCTimeStepper also returns an error estimate.
QCTimeStepper is used for the stepper parameter for .
